Text:
HolyRoses Thanx!

You have the BEST releases and the only ones that i download because of the quality and that except the AAC you have also AC3 Sound...Great!

I encountered Cinavidia on my PS3 for the first time while watching this. The audio was out but the video was playable and the note from Cinavidia remained on the bottom of the screen the whole time. I stopped playing hoping it goes away but after a minute of playback, the note came back...urgh...any ideas?
